plentry.pd: (0): High video stream, with the highest resolution and bitrate.
(1): Low video stream, with the lowest resolution and bitrate.
(4): Layer 1 of multi-quality video stream, resolution just below (0) VIDEO_STREAM_HIGH.
(5): Layer 2 of multi-quality video stream, resolution just below (4) VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_1.
(6): Layer 3 of multi-quality video stream, resolution just below (5) VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_2.
(7): Layer 4 of multi-quality video stream, resolution just below (6) VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_3.
(8): Layer 5 of multi-quality video stream, resolution just below (7) VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_4.
(9): Layer 6 of multi-quality video stream, resolution just below (8) VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_5.
(0): High video stream with the highest resolution and bitrate.

(4): Layer 1 of multi-quality video stream, with resolution just below VIDEO_STREAM_HIGH.
(5): Layer 2 of multi-quality video stream, with resolution just below VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_1.
(6): Layer 3 of multi-quality video stream, with resolution just below VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_2.
(7): Layer 4 of multi-quality video stream, with resolution just below VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_3.
